name: lib/forEach.js
forEach
description: Loops through object and executes the callback function.

params.name: options.pass
params.description: Choose what arguments to pass to callback. (`values`, `keys` or `both`)

params.name: options.fromRight
params.description: If true, starts the loop from right (in a reversed order).

name: lib/getByPath.js
lib/has.js
has
description: Determines if object has the given key(s).

params.name: key
params.description: Could be everything: String, an array of strings, or a function that returns a boolean.

name: lib/index.js
content:
import merge from './merge'
import mergeDeep from './mergeDeep'
import only from './only'
import has from './has'
import is from './is'
import isPure from './isPure'
import parsePath from './parsePath'
import getByPath from './getByPath'
import forEach from './forEach'

export default { merge, mergeDeep, only, has, is, isPure, parsePath, getByPath, forEach }

name: lib/is.js
is
description: Checks if the given argument is an object.

name: lib/isPure.js
content:
import is from './is'

/**
 * Checks if the given argument is a pure object.
 * @param {Object} obj
 */
export default obj => is(obj) && obj instanceof Object

name: isPure
description: Checks if the given argument is a pure object.

name: lib/merge.js
merge
description: Merges given objects with no recursion.

name: lib/mergeDeep.js
lib/only.js
only
description: Gives you only the wanted keys.

name: lib/parsePath.js
parsePath
description: Parses the path to an array.

content:
# XOBJ: extreme methods for objects ✨
A tiny and delightful library for manipulating objects.
> **IMPORTANT NOTICE**: I'm working on v2 with a different API, The current API (v1.1) will become deprecated. The old API is available on branch `v1`.
## Feauters
- No dependencies _(at least for now)_
- Fast and lightweight ⚡️
# Installation
**v2 is not published yet**, but it'll be available as `@hkh12/xobj`.
```sh
npm install @hkh12/xobj
```
## Usage
```js
// `x_` is an alias to xobj
const x_ = require('@hkh12/xobj')
```
**For a full list of methods, visit [here](docs/README.md).**
### Builds
There are several builds for this library. All of  them are prefixed with `xobj` and are available in `dist` library.

| Filename | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `.esm.js` | ES Module |
| `.common.js` | **Default.** CommonJS module |
| `.umd.js` | UMD build |
| `.umd.min.js` | Minified UMD build |
name: ./README.md

{
  "name": "@hkh12/xobj",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "extreme methods for objects",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "start": "rollup -cw",
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "pretest": "npm run build",
    "test": "jest",
    "makedocs": "esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/Hkh12/xobj.git"

  ],
